summary: REQ-1/REQ-2/REQ-3 appear largely implemented on the frontend (answer persistence, results review page, and subject/overall rankings UI). Backend support for subject stats and authorization is suggested by new types/imports, but key backend query/method implementations are not directly visible in the provided (truncated) backend diff summary. Several additional non-requested UX/style/admin/contributor improvements and a migration module were added.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a backend migration module and wired it into the actor via `(with migration = Migration.run)`.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not ask for data migration functionality or a separate migration module file; it is an extra implementation detail added beyond the stated requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Contributor page connection timeout/retry UX and related state management.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-1/REQ-2/REQ-3; this is additional contributor/admin UX work.

hallucinated_features.description: Home page contributor card disables navigation until actor is ready and shows 'Connecting to the canister...' loading UI.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of the requested answer persistence/results/rankings feature set.

hallucinated_features.description: Global UI/theme/palette changes and branding/AppShell updates (education-focused color palette, branding, drawer banner, live name validation warning).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in BuildRequest and unrelated to REQ-1/REQ-2/REQ-3 functional requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: New frontend authorization helper hook(s) for contributor access (useAuthz) and removal of an unlockContributorMode hook due to missing backend method.
hallucinated_features.reason: Authorization hook restructuring was not requested as part of the specified requirements.
